name: GravSpin
description:
Use the thrust of your ship to traverse your way to the centre of the universe.

Content includes: planets, which can be orbited by your ship, black holes..., giants/supernovas, which repel your ship when clicked, and wormholes, which take you to the next level. Complete the 10 levels with the least deaths as you can, to win the game.

(scientific accuracy not included)
